General.Name: Vietnam Petroleum Transport JSC
General.Description: Vietnam Petroleum Transport Joint Stock Company engages in the transportation of petroleum products in Vietnam and internationally. The company transports gasoline, civil and industrial gases, and lubricants through waterway. It is also involved in the petroleum trading, ship building and repairing, real estate, office leasing, crew supply, and agents and maritime broker businesses. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Hai Phong, Vietnam.
